contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=May 2012}} {{Infobox musical artist <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject Musicians --> | name = Valhall | background = group_or_band | alias = | origin = [[Oslo]], [[Norway]] | genre = [[Doom metal]], [[Black metal]] (early) | years_active = 1987–present | label = [[Housecore Records]] | associated_acts = | website = | current_members = [[Ronny Sorkness]]<br>[[Kenneth Sorkness]]<br>[[Frank Wanberg]]<br>[[Kenth Robin Olsen]]<br>[[Fenriz|Gylve Fenriz Nagell]] | past_members = Lars Brede Jensen<br>[[Thomas Berglie]]<br>[[Erik Lancelot]]<br>K. J. Lervåg<br>Geir Kolden<br>Frode Malm}} '''Valhall''' is a [[Norway|Norwegian]] [[doom metal]] band. It is somewhat noted for having briefly had [[Fenriz]] (of [[Darkthrone]]) as a member (1987–1989) and ex-[[Ulver]] drummer, [[Erik Lancelot]] as a member at one point as well. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *1995 – ''[[Moonstoned]]'' ([[Head Not Found]])<ref name=discography>[http://allmusic.com/artist/valhall-p467461/discography Discography] at [[Allmusic]]</ref> *1997 – ''[[Heading for Mars]]'' ([[Head Not Found]])<ref name=discography/> *2009 - ''[[Red Planet (Valhall album)|Red Planet]]'' ([[Housecore Records]])<ref name=discography/> ===Demos=== *1988 – ''Castle of death'' *1989 – ''Amalgamation'' *1990 - ''Trauma'' *1991 – ''Pagan Token'' ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{MySpace|valhall1|Valhall}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Valhall}} [[Category:Norwegian doom metal musical groups]] [[Category:Musical quintets]] [[Category:Musical groups established in 1987]] [[Category:1987 establishments in Norway]] [[Category:Musical groups from Oslo]] {{Norway-band-stub}}
